name: Christmas Present Puzzle
description:
The presents have fell out of Santa's sleigh and now you must try to get them back. Help Santa & his reindeer save Christmas by solving puzzles & getting the presents back to Santa & his reindeer.

Use physics to break ice, use balls & obstacles to guide the presents back to them. There are many presents to collect & lots of levels to challenge you! Have fun, and Merry Christmas!
